internal.content:
--- export const Title = () => ( Lab 8 - Endpoint Mapping
); --- In this lab, we will change the name of one of the Ratings Service's endpoints. ## Step 1: Using the Instana UI, bring up the dashboard for your new rs-ratings-(your last name)service. Then, Navigate to the Endpoints tab. Click on the Configure Endpoints link. ![Lab 8](images/lab8.1.png) ## Step 2: Click on the Add Custom HTTP Rule link. ![Lab 8](images/lab8.2.png) ## Step 3: Enter the following in the Custom HTTP Rule field: ``` /api/fetch/{sku} ``` Feel free to use the Rule tester (copy an actual call from the data to the tester to verify the rule is working correctly). Then, select save. ![Lab 8](images/lab8.3.png) ## Step 4: Select Add. ![Lab 8](images/lab8.4.png) And then verify that you see the new endpoint on the dashboard.

MdxNode.rawBody:
--- export const Title = () => ( Lab 8 - Endpoint Mapping
); --- In this lab, we will change the name of one of the Ratings Service's endpoints. ## Step 1: Using the Instana UI, bring up the dashboard for your new rs-ratings-(your last name)service. Then, Navigate to the Endpoints tab. Click on the Configure Endpoints link. ![Lab 8](images/lab8.1.png) ## Step 2: Click on the Add Custom HTTP Rule link. ![Lab 8](images/lab8.2.png) ## Step 3: Enter the following in the Custom HTTP Rule field: ``` /api/fetch/{sku} ``` Feel free to use the Rule tester (copy an actual call from the data to the tester to verify the rule is working correctly). Then, select save. ![Lab 8](images/lab8.3.png) ## Step 4: Select Add. ![Lab 8](images/lab8.4.png) And then verify that you see the new endpoint on the dashboard.
